metadata.creator: Office of the President
metadata.description: This volume, " Power to the Regions", details the ways by which the President ensured the institution of the people's hard-won democracy. Through various obstacles posed by the political factions, self-interests, ideological and even cultural differences, the President had remained in her desire to bring down to the people the instruments of power.
metadata.subject: Corazon C. Aquino
metadata.title: The Aquino Management Of The Presidency Power To The Regions
